problem: Develop a feature-rich asynchronous Discord music bot focused on YouTube playback with interactive UI, queue management, permissions, and video (audio) streaming.
context: The bot needs to handle YouTube URLs, playlists, and search. It requires a persistent interactive player message with a live progress bar, dual command interfaces (prefix/slash), advanced queue features (save/load/import/export), permissions (DJ mode), audio effects, seeking, vote-skip, idle disconnect, and Stage Channel support. Uses discord.py, yt-dlp, ffmpeg.
